document.full_text: on tuesday, the lede is compiling reports on the protests in syria, the war in libya and uprisings against governments across the middle east from journalists, bloggers and activists in the region.
document.title: the lede: updates on the tumult in syria and libya
lines_and_colors: on tuesday, the lede is compiling reports on the protests in syria, the war in libya and uprisings against governments across the middle east from journalists, bloggers and activists in the region.
